# rflib


The goal of rflib is to provide Oracle connection helpers to internal use.

## Installation

You can install the development version of rflib from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("research-flow/rflib")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
# rflib::oracle_connect("SCHEME",F)
## basic example code
```
